form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP, N-600 ( (Rev. 9-1-69)

full_text: Form approved. FEE STAMP Budget Bureau No. 43-R0105. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 10.00 FEE PAID No. Service APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE Immigration Newark, & Naturalizatio RECEIVED OF CITIZENSHIP Take or mail this application to: 97IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE NE70/1-37"6 Date 1-5-70 Verified DEC30 AM10:34 NEWARK, NEW JERSEY 07102 Date I&NS. NEWARK. N.J. (Print or type JOA WACHSBERGY nee PECKER (Name) (Maiden name, if any) 128 WEST 32 STREET (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, "in care of" ALIEN REGISTRATION BAYONNE HUDSON NEW JERSEY 07002 (City) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) No. A18591348 436-2984 (Telephone Number) See Instructions on Pages 5 and 6 I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am a citizen of the United States of America. (1) I was born in KIEV 1 Russia on MARCH / 1904/ (City) State or country) (Month) (Day) (Year) (2) My personal description is: Sex FEMALE complexion Medium color of eyes BROWN ; color of hair BROWN; GRAY height 5 feet 4 inches; weight 130 pounds; visible distinctive marks NONE Marital status: Single; Married; Divorced; Widow (er). (3) I arrived in the United States at NEW YORK NEW YORK on June 1905 (City and State) (Month) (Day) (Year) under the name IDA PECKER by means of BOHT Creamer unkrown personal ship or other on U.S. Passport No. NONE issued to me at on (Month) (Day) (Year) on an Immigrant Visa. (4) FILL IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU ARRIVED IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE JULY 1, 1924. KIEV RussiA (a) My last permanent foreign residence was (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at DO HOT know (City) (Country) (c) I was coming to MR BENNE PECKER at BAYONNE NEW JERSEN (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was living) (d) I traveled to the United States with MRS ESTHER PECISER - MOTHER (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) (5) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES UNITED STATES MAR 13 ARRIL 4 TWH AIRLINE NEW YORK, H.Y. 1460 1960 CO achues) (6) I HAVE NOT filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT.-Do not write between the double lines below. Continue on next page. ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books Name Manifests Manner Marital status Age (Signature of person making search) Form N-600 (Rev. 9-1-69) (1)
